member.summary: This method returns the sum of a set of metadata items that correspond to a certain key wildcard. member.param: The name of the new player.

An optional name of a "Board" for the game. Used for grouping scores together either by user group, levels, or some other method relevant to the game. An optional ranking to associate with the score. Can be any string ie: descriptions of achievements, ranking strings like "excellent", etc. Pass in null or an empty string if you do not wish to store a rank

Metadata to send with the message for the receiving application to use. Data should be specified as key/value pairs where each key and value are seperated by a comma and each pair is seperated by a ";" character including the last pair ie: key,value;key,value;. Leave empty or set to null if there is no metadata to send.
Schedule the message to be delivered after a certain date.
Send messages to an entire group of users, not just a one.

Optionally sum only items within a certain number of meters from lat/long.
Optionally provide a latitude where the search can be started from.
Optionally provide a longitude where the search can be started from.
Optionally sum only on items that have been update a number of minutes ago.
Optionally sum only items that have a certain application tag.
member.summary: This method returns the sum of a set of metadata items that correspond to a certain key wildcard. Note that the values of these items need to be numbers or floats, otherwise this method will fail. member.name: T:Buddy.VirtualAlbums
member.summary: Represents a class that can be used to interact with virtual albums. Unlike normal photoalbums any user may add existing photos to a virtual album. Only the owner of the virtual album can delete the album however.
